name: The Earth Dies Screaming
description: Let's be honest. The end was only a matter of time... So get your space diapers ready. You'll helm the controls of a flying saucer in this alien invasion simulator.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later 32 or 64 bit Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Direct3D compatible 3D graphics card with 32 MB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
